title: Mon Fr√®re, My True Love
description: Twin vamps Ryland and Ryder Durand are only different in personality while the rest is exactly the same. Ryland, the author is calm and conservative while Ryder the club owner is wild and lewd. However, the brothers share the same dark desire and haven't informed one another. Will that bring them closer together or sever their relationship for all eternity?
author: Michael Mandrake
